description.0: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.

0.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional <cryo>240%</cryo> ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

1.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional <cryo>300%</cryo> ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

2.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional <cryo>360%</cryo> ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

3.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional <cryo>420%</cryo> ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

4.0: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional <cryo>480%</cryo> ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.
